amendment.description: To require a briefing on the current status, path forward, and timeline to construct a new medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Reno, Nevada.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3208 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3208 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3208 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3208 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
